segments.text: I notice the woman so calmly drying her plate amid all this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water overflowing from the sink is heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating such a wasteful mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands in it unknowingly, and it just feels so unfortunate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are trying to get cookies, but the stool looks so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretching up there could fall and get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting eagerly makes me think of their innocence in peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting a treat, but this could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is right there, tempting them into trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden seems idyllic, highlighting the sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would turn around and prevent any harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a pity that such a normal moment could turn tragic so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes nearby might shatter if there's a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just fills me with a sense of impending sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR
